Posts.Content: Dec 10, 2013 09:42AM levassel wrote: I'm scheduled for my bilateral mastectomy with the t/e on Dec 17. I'm very glad the time has finally come...but today I'm losing my mind. I'm getting very nervous. I've had a lumpectomy and lymph node surgeries already...and they both went just fine. But this one seems pretty major. Any comforting words from anyone who's had this? Trying to get last minute Xmas shopping done...house cleaned....decorating...wrapping...but I'm running out of time!
Posts.Title: December 2013 surgeries bobogirl sandra4611
